author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Toilet flange repair tips…I use 1/4” closet flange spacers to raise the height. Ideally the flange would sit on top of the tile floor. But it’s more cost effective to use spacers with Lexel sealant. The extra long closet flange bolts are also necessary since the tabs are under the original flange. This is a strong repair that prevents leaks between the wax ring and toilet bowl since the flange is above the finished tile floor 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Toilet Flange Repair Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
